column5: Essential to all organisations, whether they are in the private, public or voluntary sector, are staff who have an understanding of processes, logistics, efficiency and people management. In highly dynamic environments, from retail to health, skills of organisation, communication and leadership are highly sought after.
column7: UK students Full-time students: £11,500 Part-time students: £77 per credit Part-time students: £38 per dissertation credit  EU/International students Full-time students: £16,800 Part-time students: £112 per credit Part-time students: £56 per dissertation credit
